description: One of two hospitality workers from England fails to pay their fine for breaking quarantine rules.
title: Coronavirus: Guernsey prison sentence for self-isolation breach
title_page: Coronavirus: Guernsey prison sentence for self-isolation breach - BBC News
maintext: Dillon was seen breaking the required two weeks self-isolation for new arrivals in Guernsey twice, once at a shop on the day of his arrival, as well as with Phillips at a pub on 16 July.
